remarks: To invert a permutation represented as a sequence of transpositions, reverse the sequence.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Aug-2015.)
statement:
symgtrinv.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
symgtrinv.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
symgtrinv.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
symgtrinv $p |- ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) -> ( I ` ( G gsum W ) ) = ( G gsum ( reverse ` W ) ) ) $.
